name: hero.neon.moe
description: A sheet manager for HERO-like RPG systems.

scripts.start: tsc && sass views/styles/main.scss:views/styles/main.css && sass views/styles/popup.scss:views/styles/popup.css && sass views/styles/statblocks.scss:views/styles/statblocks.css && node js/index.js

author: excitedneon
